segments.text: What do you think of the Olympic motto ' Higher , faster and stronger ' ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's better than ' Friendship first , competition second ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? In my opinion , it doesn't matter whether you won or not . The most important thing is participation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I still think nobody plays for nothing .
segments.speaker: S2
